inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: invasive ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant, T1 with mass no more than 2 cm in greatest dimension or stage T2 with mass more than 2 cm but no more than 5 cm in greatest dimension

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: no clinical evidence of axillary lymph node metastasis (N0)

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no clinical evidence of axillary lymph node metastasis (N0)

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: not sexually active and has no children

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with HER2-positive and ER/PR negative breast cancer, using multivitamins and iron supplements.
